There are many fruits that were found on the recently discovered planet Goocrux. There are neoskizzles that grow there, which are purple and taste like candy.
There are also loheckles, which are a grayish blue fruit and are very tart.
Pounits are a bright green color and are savory.
There are also plenty of loopnovas which are a neon pink color and taste like cotton candy.
Finally, there are fruits called glowls, which have a very sour and bitter taste and a pale orange tinge to them.
